Class PermutationsFactoradic

java.lang.Object
PermutationsFactoradic
public class PermutationsFactoradic extends Object
Utility class that includes permutations, factoradics, composition of permutations, array insertions, and gray codes

      public static int[] specificFactoradic(int degree, int value)

      Parameters:

      value - specific integer factoradic value
      Returns:

      value - integer factoradic value
      Returns:

    • combinationUtil

      public static void combinationUtil(int[] arr, int[] data, int start, int end, int index, int r, int[][] masterData, int[] mdIndex, int n)
      The recursive part of combinations
      Parameters:
      arr - input array
      data - current active combination being produced
      start - within the recursion context, the array index to start selecting at
      end - within the recursion context, the array index to stop selecting at
      index - current depth of recursion
      r - length of selection
      masterData - output data
      mdIndex - current index of masterData
      n - length of input array

    • combinations

      public static int[][] combinations(int n, int r)
      Calls combinationUtil() to produce all combinations of size r from an array of size n.
      Parameters:
      n - size of alphabet
      r - size of output array
      Returns:
      all combinations of size r from 0..n-1
